[docs]class CurrentClampSinwave(CurrentClamp):

[docs]    def __init__(self, amp, freq, delay, bias, **kwargs):
        super(CurrentClampSinwave, self).__init__(**kwargs)
        self.amp = amp
        self.freq = freq
        self.delay = delay
        self.bias = bias
